title: Getting to Know Leads Map
description: An introduction to Leads Map and how it helps you find and manage leads smarter.

title: Leads Map + Merchant Genius (Part 1)
description: Learn how to extract and use email leads from e-commerce merchants with Merchant Genius.

title: Leads Map + Merchant Genius (Part 2)
description: See how to visit websites one by one and reach out using available contact details.

title: Leads Map + Bootleads
description: Find and connect with prospects using social media URLs for direct outreach.

title: Leads Map + EachSpy
description: Get more detailed information about your leads to qualify and target them better.

title: Using Leads Map Local Storage
description: Learn how to extract and manage leads saved in your local storage file.
